Question
========
  
In a sample of 30 children of mothers who daily drank alcohol during pregnancy, the mean birth weight is 2.8 kilograms, with a standard deviation of 0.5. The mean birth weight in the general population of children is 3.4 kilograms. Test whether the mean birth weight of children of drinking mothers significantly deviates from the general population.

  
Answerlist
----------
* *t*(*df*=29)=-1.20, *p*>0.05.
* *t*(*df*=29)=-1.20, *p*<0.05.
* *t*(*df*=29)=-6.57, *p*>0.05.
* *t*(*df*=29)=-6.57, *p*<0.05.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
